text: Hello everyone, I have a question on workflows. I am on a deal and I want to assign an association label to an associated contact within a workflow. I looked it up and I didn't find a way to do, so I was wondering if you knew an application capable of doing this or do I have to do some coding ? Thanks a lot :slightly_smiling_face:
I added the theme.json file and now I am able to select my files. Still no side bar menu on the left.
